main: ^In the middle of the monotone chinks that echoed throughout the silence, a loud clunks snaps Dr. Hyde back from his own thoughts.
^The researcher can feel his risen heartbeat, yet he carefully look around with furrowed eyebrows.
^A soft scoff flows through Dr. Hyde's ears
^"Yeah, up here! Took you long enough. Even the sun's revolution is faster than you noticing me!"
^"Hey! Attention up here! Help me out, human! I can't go down because my jet rocket was busted."
^"Huh..? But you're a cat robot. Can't you just jump down?"
^"Great idea, genius! As if I never thought of that before. Just shut up and catch me, will ya? I'll give you something as a reward later on!"
